languages.text: "Пожелания госпожи Хейдари могли бы быть удовлетворены... с оговорками. Если вместе с контрактами Фалько она примет на себя его бремя обязательств передо мной, я мог бы ручаться перед кругом, что не допущу попрания интересов организации. Но, естественно, я потребую, чтобы некая связь, имеющая место между госпожой Хейдари и Вольным Торговцем, была беспощадно разорвана. Мы приемлем работу со сторонними игроками, но не ту преданность, что рождается на простынях".

"Mistress Heydari's wishes could be met... with some caveats. If, together with Falco's contracts, she assumes the burden of his obligations to me, I can stand as assurance for the circle that the organisation's interests will not be infringed upon. But I will naturally expect any connection that exists between Mistress Heydari and the Rogue Trader to be severed completely. Working with third parties we can accept, but what we cannot accept is any allegiance that originates between the sheets."
languages.original_text: "Пожелания госпожи Хейдари могли бы быть удовлетворены... с оговорками. Если вместе с контрактами Фалько она примет на себя его бремя обязательств передо мной, я мог бы ручаться перед кругом, что не допущу попрания интересов организации. Но, естественно, я потребую, чтобы некая связь, имеющая место между госпожой Хейдари и Вольным Торговцем, была беспощадно разорвана. Мы приемлем работу со сторонними игроками, но не ту преданность, что рождается на простынях".

languages.text: “我们可以满足海达利女士的愿望……不过，这么做是有前提得。如果海达利女士连同法尔科的合同一起，愿意承担她对我负有的义务，那我就愿意为海达利女士提供保护，以此保障整个组织的利益不受侵犯。但若是如此，我自然希望海达利女士彻底切断与行商浪人之间的一切联系。诚然，我们可以接受与第三方之间的合作，但我们无法接受源自床笫之欢的义务与忠诚。”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari's wishes could be met... with some caveats. If, together with Falco's contracts, she assumes the burden of his obligations to me, I can stand as assurance for the circle that the organisation's interests will not be infringed upon. But I will naturally expect any connection that exists between Mistress Heydari and the Rogue Trader to be severed completely. Working with third parties we can accept, but what we cannot accept is any allegiance that originates between the sheets."

traits.locale_text: “我们可以满足海达利女士的愿望……不过，这么做是有前提得。如果海达利女士连同法尔科的合同一起，愿意承担她对我负有的义务，那我就愿意为海达利女士提供保护，以此保障整个组织的利益不受侵犯。但若是如此，我自然希望海达利女士彻底切断与行商浪人之间的一切联系。诚然，我们可以接受与第三方之间的合作，但我们无法接受源自床笫之欢的义务与忠诚。”
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: 「ミストレス・ヘイダリの希望に沿うには…いくつかの注意点がある。ファルコの契約と一緒に、私への義務を引き受ければ、私が会合に対して組織の利益が損なわれないことを保証しよう。しかし、ミストレス・ヘイダリとローグトレーダーとの間に存在するいかなるつながりも、当然ながら完全に断ち切られねばならない。第三者との協力は認めるが、座の間の忠誠は認められないものだ」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari's wishes could be met... with some caveats. If, together with Falco's contracts, she assumes the burden of his obligations to me, I can stand as assurance for the circle that the organisation's interests will not be infringed upon. But I will naturally expect any connection that exists between Mistress Heydari and the Rogue Trader to be severed completely. Working with third parties we can accept, but what we cannot accept is any allegiance that originates between the sheets."

traits.locale_text: 「ミストレス・ヘイダリの希望に沿うには…いくつかの注意点がある。ファルコの契約と一緒に、私への義務を引き受ければ、私が会合に対して組織の利益が損なわれないことを保証しよう。しかし、ミストレス・ヘイダリとローグトレーダーとの間に存在するいかなるつながりも、当然ながら完全に断ち切られねばならない。第三者との協力は認めるが、座の間の忠誠は認められないものだ」
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: «Podríamos atender a los deseos de la señora Heydari... con algunas condiciones. Si además de los contratos de Falco asume el peso de sus obligaciones hacia mí, puedo ejercer de garantía para el círculo de que los intereses de la organización no serán objeto de infracción alguna. Naturalmente, espero que se anule toda relación entre la señora Heydari y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Una cosa es trabajar con terceros, pero las lealtades de alcoba son algo que no podemos aceptar».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari's wishes could be met... with some caveats. If, together with Falco's contracts, she assumes the burden of his obligations to me, I can stand as assurance for the circle that the organisation's interests will not be infringed upon. But I will naturally expect any connection that exists between Mistress Heydari and the Rogue Trader to be severed completely. Working with third parties we can accept, but what we cannot accept is any allegiance that originates between the sheets."

traits.locale_text: «Podríamos atender a los deseos de la señora Heydari... con algunas condiciones. Si además de los contratos de Falco asume el peso de sus obligaciones hacia mí, puedo ejercer de garantía para el círculo de que los intereses de la organización no serán objeto de infracción alguna. Naturalmente, espero que se anule toda relación entre la señora Heydari y {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente. Una cosa es trabajar con terceros, pero las lealtades de alcoba son algo que no podemos aceptar».
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: « Nous pourrions accéder à la demande de maîtresse Heydari... sous certaines conditions. Si, en plus des contrats de Falco, elle accepte de reprendre la charge de ses obligations envers moi, je suis prêt à me porter garant de ses actes pour assurer au cercle qu'ils ne porteront pas atteinte aux intérêts de l'organisation. Bien entendu, j'attends en parallèle que maîtresse Heydari coupe tout contact avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Nous pouvons accepter qu'elle collabore avec des tierces parties, mais toute alliance issue d'une relation charnelle ne sera pas tolérée. »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari's wishes could be met... with some caveats. If, together with Falco's contracts, she assumes the burden of his obligations to me, I can stand as assurance for the circle that the organisation's interests will not be infringed upon. But I will naturally expect any connection that exists between Mistress Heydari and the Rogue Trader to be severed completely. Working with third parties we can accept, but what we cannot accept is any allegiance that originates between the sheets."

traits.locale_text: « Nous pourrions accéder à la demande de maîtresse Heydari... sous certaines conditions. Si, en plus des contrats de Falco, elle accepte de reprendre la charge de ses obligations envers moi, je suis prêt à me porter garant de ses actes pour assurer au cercle qu'ils ne porteront pas atteinte aux intérêts de l'organisation. Bien entendu, j'attends en parallèle que maîtresse Heydari coupe tout contact avec {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande}. Nous pouvons accepter qu'elle collabore avec des tierces parties, mais toute alliance issue d'une relation charnelle ne sera pas tolérée. »
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Die Wünsche von Herrin Heydari könnten erfüllt werden ... mit ein paar Einschränkungen. Sollte sie Falcos Verträge und alle seine Verpflichtungen mir gegenüber übernehmen, werde ich dem Kreis versichern, dass die Interessen der Organisation nicht verletzt werden. Aber natürlich erwarte ich dann, dass jegliche Bande zwischen Herrin Heydari und {mf|dem Freihändler|der Freihändlerin} durchschnitten wird. Wir können es hinnehmen, mit Dritthändlern zusammenzuarbeiten, aber wir können auf gar keinen Fall hinnehmen, wenn Loyalitäten, die uns betreffen, zwischen den Laken entspringen."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari's wishes could be met... with some caveats. If, together with Falco's contracts, she assumes the burden of his obligations to me, I can stand as assurance for the circle that the organisation's interests will not be infringed upon. Working with third parties we can accept, but what we cannot accept is any allegiance that originates between the sheets."

Wir können es hinnehmen, mit Dritthändlern zusammenzuarbeiten, aber wir können auf gar keinen Fall hinnehmen, wenn Loyalitäten, die uns betreffen, zwischen den Laken entspringen."
traits.speaker: Mercy

languages.text: "Üstat Heydari'nin istekleri, bazı ihtarlara riayet ettiği sürece yerine getirilebilir. Kontratlarıyla beraber Falco'nun bana olan sorumluluklarını da üstlenirse grubun, organizasyonun çıkarlarının ihmal edilmeyeceği konusundaki taahhüdü ben olabilirim. Ancak doğal olarak Üstat Heydari ve Hür Tacir arasındaki her türlü bağlantının tamamen koparılmasını beklerim. Üçüncü partilerle çalışmak kabul edilebilir bir şey olsa da yatakta doğmuş bir ittifakı kabul edemeyiz."
languages.original_text: "Mistress Heydari's wishes could be met... with some caveats. If, together with Falco's contracts, she assumes the burden of his obligations to me, I can stand as assurance for the circle that the organisation's interests will not be infringed upon. But I will naturally expect any connection that exists between Mistress Heydari and the Rogue Trader to be severed completely. Working with third parties we can accept, but what we cannot accept is any allegiance that originates between the sheets."

traits.locale_text: "Üstat Heydari'nin istekleri yerine getirilebilir. Bazı ihtarlara riayet ettiği sürece. Kontratlarıyla beraber Falco'nun bana olan sorumluluklarını da üstlenirse, grubun, organizasyonun çıkarlarının ihmal edilmeyeceği konusundaki taahhüdü ben olabilirim. Ama doğal olarak Üstat Heydari ve Hür Tacir arasındaki her türlü bağlantının tamamen koparılmasını beklerim. Üçüncü partilerle çalışmak kabul edilebilir bir şey ancak çarşafların içinden doğmuş bir ittifakı kabul edemeyiz."
traits.speaker: Mercy
